summary: AS FOUND WITH MANY OTHER COMPLAINTS ONLINE REGARDING THE SORENTO, THE PARTS INSIDE THE DOOR HANDLE BROKE AND THE DOOR HANDLE FELL OFF WHEN I ATTEMPTED TO OPEN THE DOOR. ALL THE PARTS INSIDE, INCLUDING THE DOOR HANDLE ARE PLASTIC AND, APPARENTLY DEFECTIVE. YOU CANNOT GET INTO YOUR CAR.   IF THE HANDLES FALL OFF WHILE DRIVING, IT CAN HIT A FOLLOWING CAR AND POSSIBLY CAUSE A CASUALTY.
